tool_description: Checks availability of shipping services for specific routes, package types, and delivery requirements across carriers.

carriers.description: List of carriers to check availability for

ship_date.description: Planned ship date in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid postal codes: Origin or destination postal codes are not valid
Invalid package weight: Weight must be a positive number within carrier limits
Invalid package type: Package type must be supported (box, envelope, tube, etc.)
No carriers specified: At least one carrier must be provided
Invalid ship date: Ship date must be in the future if provided
Service restrictions: Hazardous materials restrictions apply for some carriers
usage: Provide origin and destination postal codes, package specifications, and list of carriers. Optionally specify ship_date and hazardous_materials flag. Returns available services.

available_services.description: List of available services as 'carrier:service' pairs

restricted_services.description: List of restricted services with reasons

international_shipping.description: Whether this requires international shipping services
